title: An Introduction to Type Design | The Type Designer as Craftsman
content: After _[The Type Designer as Artist](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013052603/http:/www.fontshop.be/details.php?entry=161)_, the first part of _[The Type Designer as Craftsman](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013052603/http:/www.fontshop.be/details.php?entry=230)_ is up at last.
author: Bald Condensed
